TITLE: Vietnam Bans Tom Holland Film 'Uncharted' over Pro-CCP South China Sea Map
SUMMARY: Vietnam has banned a new Hollywood film starring Tom Holland over scenes with a map showing Beijing's claims to the South China Sea.

TITLE: Brazil's Bolsonaro Follows Up Biden Meeting with Feud Against Hulk Actor 'Mark Ruffles'
SUMMARY: Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro mocked Hollywood actor Mark Ruffalo and appeared to insult his intelligence on Thursday in response to Ruffalo accusing Bolsonaro of threatening a "coup" in his own country.

TITLE: Cambridge Dictionary Changes Woman Definition to Push Transgenderism
SUMMARY: The Cambridge Dictionary appears to have followed Merriam-Webster down the rabbit hole into woke oblivion by changing the definition of "Woman" to appease transgender radicals.
